OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive PEG-interferon alfa-2b subcutaneously ( SC ) weekly . Treatment continue basic fibroblast growth factor level suppress normal maximum weekly dose reach . If disease progression , patient discontinue treatment . If disease progression , patient receive PEG-interferon alfa-2b SC weekly 1 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year every 6 month 1 year .
